wikimediaapiportal-skin-login-link-label: Label for the log in button
wikimediaapiportal-skin-button-clear-sea: Tooltip for the button that clears the search input
wikimediaapiportal-skin-disclaimer: Disclaimer text for API portal site
wikimediaapiportal-skin-page-nav-predefi: Predefined list of page structures. Much like Sidebar
wikimediaapiportal-skin-return-to-page-l: Label for the button that returns user to the subject page, when on talk page
wikimediaapiportal-skin-updated-ts-label:
Label for the last update date. 
$1 - date formatted in user's format
wikimediaapiportal-skin-search-placehold: Search placeholder in the search box
tooltip-wikimediaapiportal-skin-search-t: Search tooltip of the search box
